text: Imana yamanuye amajambo meza cane arico gitabu kirimwo amajambo ahuje n’ayandi kandi aguma asubirwamwo, urukoba rw’umubiri narwo rwama ruhinda agashitsi kuri barya batinya Umuremyi wabo, hanyuma urukoba rwabo narwo hamwe n’imitima yabo iguma ihwahutse mukwibuka Umuremyi wabo, ubwo nibwo burokoke bw’Imana, kuri ubwo burokoke irongora uwo yishakiye, kandi uwurekuriwe n’Imana yuko yazimiye, ntankundi rero uwo muntu ntawuzo murongora
